For all those of you who are trying to figure out how to completely uninstall AES on Windows 7:

1. Go to the Aerosoft folder in the main FS9 folder and delete the remaining AES folder in FS9/Aerosoft/AES and also delete AES from the scenery.cfg.
2. go to the start menu click Run, and type Regedit.exe.
3. When the folder opens click HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\Aerosoft\{D48E210F-8F8C-404e-B3D7-F4BF6881F193}
Delete this file
4. Then click HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\aerosoft\AES-Basepack&&AirportPack
Delete this file
5. Then click HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\aerosoft\Airport Enhancement Services
Delete this file
6. Then go to HKEY_USERS\S-1-5-21-1214440339-1450960922-839522115-1004\Software\VB an VBA Program Settings\{D48E210F-8F8C-404e-B3D7-F4BF6881F193}
Delete this file aswell
